TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示電子郵件寄件者或收件者的地址。

span.span: Represents the address of an electronic mail sender or recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供和類別來存放位址資訊的電子郵件訊息。The class is used by the and classes to store address information for email messages. 郵件地址組成名稱，名稱並選擇性地。A mail address is composed of a name, name and optionally, a . 可以包含非 ASCII 字元，如果您將它們編碼。The can contain non-ASCII characters if you encode them. 類別支援下列的郵件地址格式：The class supports the following mail address formats: - 簡單的位址格式`user@host`。A simple address format of `user@host`. 如果未設定，這是產生的郵件地址格式。If a is not set, this is the mail address format generated. - 標準加上引號的顯示名稱格式`"display name" `。A standard quoted display name format of `"display name" `. 如果已經設定，這是產生的格式。If a is set, this is the format generated. - 角括弧前後加入名稱和命名時，如果它們未包含在內。Angle brackets are added around the name and name, if these are not included. 例如，`"display name" user@host`變更為`"display name" `。For example, `"display name" user@host` is changed to `"display name" `. - 前後加入引號，如果它們未包含在內。Quotes are added around the , if these are not included. 例如，`display name `變更為`"display name" `。For example, `display name ` is changed to `"display name" `. - 支援 Unicode 字元屬性。Unicode characters are supported in the property. - A括住的名稱。A name with quotes. 例如，`"user name"@host`。For example, `"user name"@host`. - 在 使用者名稱的連續和後置點。Consecutive and trailing dots in user names. 例如，`user...name..@host`。For example, `user...name..@host`. - 網域常值加上括號。Bracketed domain literals. 例如，``。For example, ``. - 註解。Comments. 例如，`(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`。For example, `(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`. 移除註解，才能加以傳送。Comments are removed before transmission. 逗號用來分隔地址的清單中的元素。A comma is used to separate elements in a list of mail addresses. 如此一來，逗號不應在清單中的不具引號的顯示名稱。As a result, a comma should not be used in unquoted display names in a list. 允許下列的郵件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John, Doe" , "Bob, Smith" ` 不會允許下列的郵件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `John, Doe , Bob, Smith ` 引號可以內嵌在加上引號的字串中，但它們必須逸出。Quotes can be embedded in a quoted string, but they must be escaped. 允許下列的郵件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John \"Jr\" Doe" ` `"\"John \\\"Jr\\\" Doe\" "` 不會允許下列的郵件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `"John "Jr" Doe" ` 當使用者名稱是附註附加引號的字串 （或逗號） 的開始之間的所有文字，且位址會被視為屬於，包括註解。When the username is note quoted, all text between the start of the string (or comma) and the address are considered part of the , including comments. 例如：For example: `(non comment) unquoted display (non comment) name (non comment) ` 雖然類別接受有效的、 其他郵件伺服器可能不會接受郵件地址的郵件地址。Although the class accepts a mail address as valid, other mail servers may not accept the mail address. 類別不支援下列的郵件地址格式：The class does not support the following mail address formats: - 混合的加引號及不具引號的顯示名稱。Mixed quoted and unquoted display names. 例如，`display "name" `。For example, `display "name" `. - 群組，如 RFC 2822 IETF 所發行的 3.4 節中所定義。Groups, as defined in RFC 2822 Section 3.4 published by the IETF. - 過時的使用者名稱格式`"user"."name"@host`，`user."name"@host`或`"user".name@host`。The obsolete user name formats of `"user"."name"@host`, `user."name"@host` or `"user".name@host`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由傳送電子郵件， ，和類別。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message by using the , , and classes. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#10)]

summary.span: 使用指定的位址將新的 執行個體初始化。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `address`參數可以包含的顯示名稱和相關聯的電子郵件地址，如果角括號括住的位址。The `address` parameter can contain a display name and the associated email address if you enclose the address in angle brackets. 例如：For example: `"Tom Smith "` 泛空白字元是顯示名稱和角括弧之間不允許。White space is permitted between the display name and the angle brackets. 下表顯示的屬性值使用上述的範例位址建構的物件。The following table shows the property values for a object constructed using the preceding example address. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`"Tom Smith"`| ||`"contoso.com"`| ||`"tsmith"`| ||`"tsmith@contoso.com"`| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個建構函式來建立物件收件者電子郵件訊息。The following code example uses this constructor to create a object for the recipient of an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified address and display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的顯示名稱的開頭和尾端空白會獲得保留。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果`displayName`包含非 ASCII 字元的 iso-8859-1 字元集用於`displayName`編碼方式。If `displayName` contains non-ASCII characters, the iso-8859-1 character set is used for the `displayName` encoding. RFC 1522，可在非 ASCII 字元編碼會討論[ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。Encoding non-ASCII characters is discussed in RFC 1522, which is available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). 如果`address`包含顯示名稱，並`displayName`不是`null`且不等於，`displayName`中指定的值會覆寫`address`。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個建構函式來建立寄件者和收件者電子郵件訊息的執行個體。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender and recipient of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的顯示名稱的開頭和尾端空白會獲得保留。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果`address`包含顯示名稱，並`displayName`不是`null`且不等於，`displayName`中指定的值會覆寫`address`。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. 方法不會檢查，如果`displayName`參數才有效。The method does not check if the `displayName` parameter is valid. 這個方法會移除下不顯示周圍的引號屬性。This method removes surrounding quotes not displayed by the property. 會加入引號括住，才能加以傳送，除非或是中指定`displayNameEncoding`參數。Quotes will be added before transmission, except where or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 中指定的編碼`displayNameEncoding`參數將會套用至屬性，才能傳輸或是中指定`displayNameEncoding`參數。The encoding specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter will be applied to the property before transmission or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 如果未指定編碼預設值。 is the default encoding if none is specified. 如需有關支援的郵件地址格式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on supported mail address formats, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個建構函式來建立寄件者的電子郵件訊息的執行個體。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 人類看得懂的格式，會傳回包含非 ASCII 字元的顯示名稱。Display names that contain non-ASCII characters are returned in human-readable form. 使用方法來取得編碼的格式的。Use the method to get the encoded form of the . 有些軟體程式，可讀取的電子郵件顯示屬性值，或除了電子郵件地址。Some software programs that are used to read email display the property value instead of, or in addition to, the email address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示收件者電子郵件訊息。The following code example displays the for the recipient of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的電子郵件地址，主應用程式字串會包含所有資訊的下列 「`@`"符號。In a typical email address, the host string includes all information following the "`@`" sign. 例如，在`"tsmith@contoso.com"`，主機是`"contoso.com"`。For example, in `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, the host is `"contoso.com"`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示電子郵件訊息的目的地。The following code example displays the destination of an email message.
